name: Statuette of Odysseus under a Ram
description: Statuette of Odysseus under a Ram; Unknown; Sicily, Italy; 525 - 500 B.C.; Terracotta with paste (milk of lime) and polychromy (pink); 14.2 × 16.7 cm (5 9/16 × 6 9/16 in.); 79.AD.37; Gift of Lee Rizzuto; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Statuette of Odysseus under a Ram
medium: Terracotta with paste (milk of lime) and polychromy (pink)
